00053 
00054 String CommandShell::ms_history_file = "";
00055 
00056 namespace {
00057   void termination_handler (int signum) {
00058     write_history(CommandShell::ms_history_file.c_str());
00059     exit(1);
00060   }
00061 
00062   const char *help_text =
00063   "\n" \
00064   "Interpreter Meta Commands\n" \
00065   "-------------------------\n" \
00066   "?          (\\?) Synonym for `help'.\n" \
00067   "clear      (\\c) Clear command.\n" \
00068   "exit       (\\q) Exit program. Same as quit.\n" \
00069   "print      (\\p) Print current command.\n" \
00070   "quit       (\\q) Quit program.\n" \
00071   "source <f> (.)  Execute commands in file <f>.\n" \
00072   "system     (\\!) Execute a system shell command.\n" \
00073   "\n";
00074 }

00077 
00080 CommandShell::CommandShell(const String &program_name,
00081     CommandInterpreterPtr &interp_ptr, const Config::VarMap &vm)
00082     : m_program_name(program_name), m_interp_ptr(interp_ptr), m_varmap(vm),
00083       m_batch_mode(false), m_silent(false), m_test_mode(false),
00084       m_no_prompt(false), m_cont(false), m_line_read(0) {
00085   m_prompt_str = program_name + "> ";
00086   m_batch_mode = m_varmap.count("batch") ? true : false;
00087   if (m_batch_mode)
00088     m_silent = true;
00089   else
00090     m_silent = m_varmap.count("silent") ? true : false;
00091   m_test_mode = m_varmap.count("test-mode") ? true : false;
00092   m_no_prompt = m_varmap.count("no-prompt") ? true : false;
00093 }

00099 char *CommandShell::rl_gets () {
00100   if (m_line_read) {
00101     free (m_line_read);
00102     m_line_read = (char *)NULL;
00103   }
00104 
00105   /* Get a line from the user. */
00106   if (m_batch_mode || m_no_prompt || m_silent || m_test_mode) {
00107     if (!getline(cin, m_input_str))
00108       return 0;
00109     boost::trim(m_input_str);
00110     if (m_input_str.find("quit", 0) != 0 && !m_silent)
00111       cout << m_input_str << endl;
00112     return (char *)m_input_str.c_str();
00113   }
00114   else if (!m_cont)
00115     m_line_read = readline(m_prompt_str.c_str());
00116   else
00117     m_line_read = readline("         -> ");
00118 
00119   /* If the line has any text in it, save it on the history. */
00120   if (!m_batch_mode && !m_test_mode && m_line_read && *m_line_read)
00121     add_history (m_line_read);
00122 
00123   return m_line_read;
00124 }

00128 void CommandShell::add_options(Config::Desc &desc) {
00129   desc.add_options()
00130     ("batch", "Disable interactive behavior")
00131     ("no-prompt", "Do not display an input prompt")
00132     ("silent", "Be silent. Don't echo commands or display progress")
00133     ("test-mode", "Don't display anything that might change from run to run (e.g. timing statistics)")
00134     ("timestamp-format", Config::value<std::string>(), "Output format for timestamp.  Currently the only formats are 'default' and 'usecs'")
00135     ;
00136 }

00142 int CommandShell::run() {
00143   const char *line;
00144   queue<string> command_queue;
00145   String command;
00146   String timestamp_format;
00147   String source_commands;
00148   const char *base, *ptr;
00149 
00150   ms_history_file = (String)getenv("HOME") + "/." + m_program_name + "_history";
00151 
00152   if (m_varmap.count("timestamp-format"))
00153     timestamp_format = m_varmap["timestamp-format"].as<String>();
00154 
00155   if (timestamp_format != "")
00156     m_interp_ptr->set_timestamp_output_format(timestamp_format);
00157 
00158   if (!m_batch_mode && !m_silent) {
00159 
00160     read_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00161 
00162     cout << endl;
00163     cout << "Welcome to the " << m_program_name << " command interpreter." << endl;
00164     cout << "For information about Hypertable, visit http://www.hypertable.org/" << endl;
00165     cout << endl;
00166     cout << "Type 'help' for a list of commands, or 'help shell' for a" << endl;
00167     cout << "list of shell meta commands." << endl;
00168     cout << endl << flush;
00169   }
00170 
00171   if (signal (SIGINT, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00172     signal (SIGINT, SIG_IGN);
00173   if (signal (SIGHUP, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00174     signal (SIGHUP, SIG_IGN);
00175   if (signal (SIGTERM, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00176     signal (SIGTERM, SIG_IGN);
00177 
00178   m_accum = "";
00179   if (!m_batch_mode)
00180     using_history();
00181   while ((line = rl_gets()) != 0) {
00182 
00183     try {
00184 
00185       if (*line == 0)
00186         continue;
00187 
00188       if (!strncasecmp(line, "help shell", 10)) {
00189         cout << help_text;
00190         continue;
00191       }
00192       else if (!strncasecmp(line, "help", 4) || !strncmp(line, "\\h", 2) || *line == '?') {
00193         command = line;
00194         std::transform(command.begin(), command.end(), command.begin(), ::tolower);
00195         trim_if(command, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00196         m_interp_ptr->execute_line(command);
00197         continue;
00198       }
00199       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "quit") || !strcasecmp(line, "exit") || !strcmp(line, "\\q")) {
00200         if (!m_batch_mode)
00201           write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00202         return 0;
00203       }
00204       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "print") || !strcmp(line, "\\p")) {
00205         cout << m_accum << endl;
00206         continue;
00207       }
00208       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "clear") || !strcmp(line, "\\c")) {
00209         m_accum = "";
00210         m_cont = false;
00211         continue;
00212       }
00213       else if (!strncmp(line, "source", 6) || line[0] == '.') {
00214         if ((base = strchr(line, ' ')) == 0) {
00215           cout << "syntax error: source or '.' must be followed by a space character" << endl;
00216           continue;
00217         }
00218         String fname = base;
00219         trim_if(fname, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00220         off_t flen;
00221         if ((base = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(fname.c_str(), &flen)) == 0)
00222           continue;
00223         source_commands = "";
00224         ptr = strtok((char *)base, "\n\r");
00225         while (ptr != 0) {
00226           command = ptr;
00227           boost::trim(command);
00228           if (command.find("#") != 0)
00229             source_commands += command + " ";
00230           ptr = strtok(0, "\n\r");
00231         }
00232         if (source_commands == "")
00233           continue;
00234         delete [] base;
00235         line = source_commands.c_str();
00236       }
00237       else if (!strncasecmp(line, "system", 6) || !strncmp(line, "\\!", 2)) {
00238         String command = line;
00239         size_t offset = command.find_first_of(' ');
00240         if (offset != String::npos) {
00241           command = command.substr(offset+1);
00242           trim_if(command, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00243           system(command.c_str());
00244         }
00245         continue;
00246       }
00247       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "status") || !strcmp(line, "\\s")) {
00248         cout << endl << "no status." << endl << endl;
00249         continue;
00250       }
00251 
00252 
00256       base = line;
00257       ptr = strchr(base, ';');
00258       while (ptr) {
00259         m_accum += string(base, ptr-base);
00260         if (m_accum.size() > 0) {
00261           boost::trim(m_accum);
00262           if (m_accum.find("#") != 0)
00263             command_queue.push(m_accum);
00264           m_accum = "";
00265           m_cont = false;
00266         }
00267         base = ptr+1;
00268         ptr = strchr(base, ';');
00269       }
00270       command = string(base);
00271       boost::trim(command);
00272       if (command != "" && command.find("#") != 0) {
00273         m_accum += command;
00274         boost::trim(m_accum);
00275       }
00276       if (m_accum != "") {
00277         m_cont = true;
00278         m_accum += " ";
00279       }
00280 
00281       while (!command_queue.empty()) {
00282         if (command_queue.front() == "quit" || command_queue.front() == "exit") {
00283           if (!m_batch_mode)
00284             write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00285           return 0;
00286         }
00287         command = command_queue.front();
00288         command_queue.pop();
00289         if (!strncmp(command.c_str(), "pause", 5)) {
00290           String sec_str = command.substr(5);
00291           boost::trim(sec_str);
00292           char *endptr;
00293           long secs = strtol(sec_str.c_str(), &endptr, 0);
00294           if (secs == 0 && errno == EINVAL || *endptr != 0) {
00295             cout << "error: invalid seconds specification" << endl;
00296             if (m_batch_mode)
00297               return 1;
00298           }
00299           else
00300             poll(0, 0, secs*1000);
00301         }
00302         else
00303           m_interp_ptr->execute_line(command);
00304       }
00305 
00306     }
00307     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00308       cerr << "Error: " << e.what() << " - " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << endl;
00309       if (m_batch_mode)
00310         return 1;
00311       m_accum = "";
00312       while (!command_queue.empty())
00313         command_queue.pop();
00314       m_cont=false;
00315     }
00316 
00317   }
00318 
00319   if (!m_batch_mode)
00320     write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00321   return 0;
00322 
00323 }
